projects.title: El Bombas
projects.description: Multiplayer web game based on the classic Bomberman. The game includes a character store and an economy system with coins that can be earned by playing games. Each character has unique attributes. Play games and fight for the N¬∫1 position in the global Scoreboard.

projects.title: PictoTrainer
projects.description: Web and mobile application for the training and rehabilitation of people with functional diversity, presented to the HackForAlbacity2020 competition in collaboration with the CRMF-IMSERSO.

projects.title: X-Wing VR
projects.description: Virtual Reality mobile game in which you can drive an X-Wing starfighter and engage Empire's enemies. Implemented in Unreal Engine 4 for Google Cardboard.

projects.title: World in Miniature
projects.description: Virtual Reality interface technique that lets the user interact with a hand-held miniature copy of the virtual environment. Implemented in Unreal Engine 4 using HTC VIVE.

projects.title: PuerTICas
projects.description: Access control application to a smart building using facial recognition authorization. Cloud architecture based on AWS services under the IaaC paradigm.
